attributes.review: So like I was gonna download this app to see wassup with my boi Mr. Cheeto Puff and you won’t believe what I saw 😱😱should I even say it? Bet. I was scrolling around and I saw one of his leaked pics 😱😱then it said l “I have your ip” I said ah this boi gonna swat me. But I had the power in my voice and to end his career I said “ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆” Ofc he got scared and dipped pls don’t scroll too far he’ll catch you lackin no 🧢. I have to rate it 1 star because you won’t ever catch me lackin again and that’s on the 58 kids hiding inside my basement. I would like to dedicate this review to the boys and all the support I get from them ❤️
attributes.title: CHEETO PUFF WILL GET YOUR IP YOU WONT BELIEVE WHAT ELSE 😱😱😱😱

attributes.review: I can’t express how unhappy I am. I expected so much more. I opened this app, and IMMEDIATELY another window popped up. It ended up sending me to a PORNOGRAPHY site. I was with my husband and kids at the dinner table eating the pot roast I slaved over for HOURS in the kitchen. I had to explain to my 8 and 4 year old children why naked people were on my phone. Undoubtedly, I’ve failed as a mother. I can’t believe that the president of our COUNTRY would force me to expose my children to this nonsense. Luckily, I had both of my offspring baptized, so they are blessed with the grace of God Himself. I hope they are able to move past this traumatic experience, and find God in the process. 🙏🏻
attributes.title: Terrible Experience!

attributes.review: this app is maybe the worst app on the entire app store. not only does it take forever to download but the second you open it it asks for your phone number. i just wanted this app to make fun of the orange man but instead he tried to take my information. this app has no respect for my personal privacy and due to immediately seeing an orange cheeto the second i opened this app i proceeded to hurl on my phone which caused $100 in damage repair. the design of this app could have been done by a five year old (at least then it would have been better executed than it currently is) and it was a waste of storage space. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: cause my phone to glitch

attributes.review: I open the app to see a picture of a naked wrinkly cheeto. my pet dinosaur saw it and it’s scarred for life!!!!! this app also promotes racism, transphobia, homophobia and so many other disgusting and degrading things. my pet chicken saw this app and died!!!! Bob Ross would not approve of this!!!!! never in my life have I ever been any more offended!!!! if I could rate this app is zero I would it is awful -1000 out of 10 would recommend. not to mention I found this brainwashing app on my child’s phone OK that is endangering my child mental health. this subliminal messaging very very offending at needs to be taken off the App Store immediately!!! Spiderman would not approve of this at all!!!😤😤😤😔😔😔👁💧👄💧👁🤢🤢🤢🤢~DE C US TA NG~
attributes.title: Disgusting and offensive

attributes.review: this app crashed multiple times once i downloaded it. the opening screen also made our amazing, gorgeous, and wonderful president look like a complete ORANGE. that is completely disrespectful, especially when he’s done nothing but AMAZING things for this country like...anyways, once i opened the app it said that it had 10 seconds before it would delete itself giving me no time to type in all my personal information that could be used to track and kill me. unfortunately i didnt make it and am now telling you this from beyond the grave. so i’m giving you this warning now DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! instead vote democratic, since trumps app blew me up. k bye
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: So i had read online, from a very credible source (fox news), that this app has hypnotic capabilities. I was so excited to finally be able to convert from a snowflake libtard ❄️🤢 to an elite trump humper 🤩🇺🇸 instead, the app gave me brain damage, morphed me into a slug of a human, and completely depleted my iq. Im so disappointed with the results. Ive also noticed a strange tendencies to despise minorities, speak and act misogynisticly, and be an all around unlikeable human :( Ive lost my ability to articulate; i can construct sentences mentally but all that leaves my mouth is “TRUMP 2020.” Im scared these effects may be irreversible and that i will live out the rest of my life as an ignorant, grimy cretin. Why didnt the app work?????!!??????
attributes.title: So disappointed

attributes.review: It took a little too long to download, I am connected to WiFi and it works perfectly with everything else, so I don’t know why it’s not working. Also, when I tried to press “get involved” my phone shut down. I thought it wasn’t anything and I tried again, but it didn’t work. I wanted to make my grandparents proud and try to help out our president, but I guess that won’t happen because this app is trash. Make it better or just delete it. Very, very disappointed.  Now I am going to be kicked out of my house because I can’t go help out our president. So thank you for that. TRASH.
attributes.title: My family is going to kick me out because of this app.

attributes.review: I opened the app for the first time to get some information on our presidents campaign and was asked to put my phone number I did so and 5 minutes later I got a phone call from the 🍊itself and he proceeded to insult me about my nationality which made me fall into a deep depression which has caused me to eat all the chex mix in my pantry so now I have an obesity problem and can’t go down stairs unless i put myself in ball form and roll down them and use my rolls to stop my fall but eventually my rolls got caught on a rail and I lost a large chunk of skin all I ask is for this app to be deleted so other people don’t go through something similar.
attributes.title: Terrible application

attributes.review: He keeps exiting me out and then once I finally get on it shows up like 100 pop of scams when I clicked off of them all it just show a blank screen I went there I think it was loading so I went there a way there and then I thought it’s probably not loading so I just tried to turn off that but I literally froze my phone so I literally got to get my phone fixed and literally but I actually got so scared that this weird app hacked me don’t download it if you want to get hacked I’m lucky I got a fix in time I don’t know what’s gonna happen if I just left Adelphi any longer it will probably steal your information
attributes.title: This App mouse broke my phone

attributes.review: From an 18 year old who can actually vote and is actually educated unlike the brainwashed trump supporters who are ignorant, have selective learning, and wish it was the 1930s, please please please vote blue!!! I know this is just an stupid app review but if the state of this country doesn’t prove that we need new administration and a new president who isn’t racist, homophobic, transphobic, and a literal child rapist and womanizer then I don’t know what will. We should all come together and settle for Biden to get this guy out of the White House, I 100% understand that he is not our dream candidate, believe me, but he’s the only reasonable choice. 💙💙💙
attributes.title: Don’t download this app😔
